title: President's Pension Act, 1974
description: Official consolidated text of President's Pension Act, 1974 (IX of 1975) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement.(1) This Act may be called the President's Pension
provisions.content:
Act,1974
(2) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Amount and condition of pension
provisions.content:
There shall be payable to every person who, having
held, after the nineteenth day of December, 1971, the office of President for not less than two years
and not having been removed therefrom for violating the constitution or gross misconduct, has
ceased to hold such office, a monthly pension for life of 2[eighty five percentum of the salary
payable to such person] free from all taxes 2[.]

[3. Provision of other facilities.—(1) The President who is entitled to pension under this
Act, shall further be entitled to the facilities specified in clause (a) of the Schedule.
(2) The widow of the President referred to in sub-section (1) shall be entitled to the facilities
specified in clause (b) of the Schedule.]

provisions.title: Section 4. Expenditure on pension and other facilities to be charged on Federal Consolidated
provisions.content:
Fund.— The expenditure on the pension and other facilities aforesaid shall be charged upon the
Federal Consolidated Fund.
